channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump has vowed to kill US offshore wind projects. Will he succeed?
item.description: Opponents of offshore wind energy projects expect President-elect Donald Trump to kill an industry he has vowed to end on the first day he returns to the White House.

item.title: Vanderbilt QB Diego Pavia sues NCAA over eligibility limits for former JUCO players
item.description: Vanderbilt quarterback Diego Pavia is suing the NCAA challenging its rules limiting the eligibility of former junior college players after transferring to a Division I school as “unjustifiably” restraining athletes’ ability to earn money under name, image and likeness rules.

item.title: Democrat April McClain Delaney wins a US House seat in a competitive Maryland race
item.description: Democrat April McClain Delaney has narrowly won a U.S. House seat in Maryland’s most competitive congressional races.
